message.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to log out?

error.saveFail: An error occurred while saving. Please try again.
error.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
error.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
error.generalError: An error occurred. Please try again; Contact the administrator if the problem persists.
error.serverError: Server error occurred. Please contact the administrator.
error.missingFields: Please fill in all fields correctly.
error.fileSizeError: The maximum file size allowed is 20MB.
error.noImgToUpload: Select an image file to insert.
error.imgInsertFail: Failed to insert image. Please try again.
error.imgUploadFail: An error occurred while uploading the image. Please try again.
error.invalidImageType: Unsupported image format. Only JPG, PNG, BMP, WebP, and GIF are allowed.
error.revertError: An error occurred while reverting. Please try again.
error.revertNoBackupForTab: No backup data found for this tab.
error.resetPWFail: An error occurred while resetting the password. Please try again.
error.sendFail: An error occurred while sending. Please try again.
error.templateLoadError: An error occurred while loading the template.
error.duplicateId: This ID is already in use by another user.
error.changeFail: An error occurred while changing the password. Please try again.
error.signupFail: An error occurred during sign up.

initpage.signupIdDescription: This ID will be your domain. You CANNOT change it later.
initpage.signupEmailDescription: If you forget your password, you will receive email here.
initpage.signupSuccess: Sign up successful. Please log in.
initpage.invalidCharacters: Only lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens (-), and underscores (_) are allowed.
initpage.lengthError: ID must be between 3 and 20 characters long.
initpage.demoLoginDescription: Log in to this test account to try it out!

admin.howToActivateImgTab: Click the 'Change to Default Image' button or select a file and choose an image to activate the image area.
admin.tabManagerDescription: Drag up and down to change the order of tabs.
admin.tabManagerDescriptionMobile: On mobile, press and hold a tab, then move it up or down.
admin.deleteConfirm: All contents in this tab will be deleted. Are you sure you want to delete?
admin.saveWarning: Changes will be lost if you switch tabs or leave the page without saving.
admin.currentImageDelete: The current set image will be deleted.
admin.imageToDefaultConfirm: Are you sure you want to change to the default image?
admin.imageTabHideConfirm: Hiding the image tab will make the home tab look like other tabs.

editor.revertConfirm: Do you want to revert to the previous version? All current inputs will be lost.

requireAuth.cannotAccess: You cannot access this page without logging in.

alertBanner.bugAnnouncement: The text contents on the Home tab might not show up. Please switch to another tab and come back — it should appear correctly. I’m working on a fix!

inProgress.guideWritingDescription: Currently, the guide-kr account is being used to write a detailed usage guide.
inProgress.guideWritingDescription2: The document is still incomplete, but you can check it out below.
inProgress.guideWritingDescription3: Later, the guide-en account will be used to provide an English version of the guide.
inProgress.knownIssuesDescription: The text contents on the Home tab might not show up. Please switch to another tab and come back — it should appear correctly.
inProgress.knownIssuesDescription2: The image insertion fails: This is not a failed upload. It works correctly on the public page. It may be restored by switching to another tab, continuing to write, logging out and then logging in again.
